phrases.original: Please check to ensure that the link has not been modified, then try again.
phrases.translated: Please check to ensure that the link has not been modified, then try again.

phrases.original: Times shown above are in the {TIME-ZONE} time zone
phrases.translated: Times shown above are in the {TIME-ZONE} time zone

phrases.original: To process your unsubscription, select an option below:
phrases.translated: To process your unsubscription, select an option below:

phrases.original: Unsubscribe from notifications only about the invite above. Any other invites you have sent to {RECIPIENT-NAME} will remain unchanged.
phrases.translated: Unsubscribe from notifications only about the invite above. Any other invites you have sent to {RECIPIENT-NAME} will remain unchanged.

phrases.original: Unsubscribe from notifications about all invites you have sent to {RECIPIENT-NAME} via {SENT-VIA}.
phrases.translated: Unsubscribe from notifications about all invites you have sent to {RECIPIENT-NAME} via {SENT-VIA}.

phrases.original: Unsubscribe from notifications about invites you have sent to any recipient (not just {RECIPIENT-NAME}).
phrases.translated: Unsubscribe from notifications about invites you have sent to any recipient (not just {RECIPIENT-NAME}).

phrases.original: NOTE: this option requires logging in.
phrases.translated: NOTE: this option requires logging in.
